explains: adv. 果断地；断然地；明显；毫无疑问

sentences.en: He admits there will be moments when he's decidedly uncomfortable at what he sees on the screen.
sentences.cn: 他承认有时候看到屏幕上的内容他感到明显不舒服。

sentences.en: "I want the child to be treated kindly," Mr. Sesemann added decidedly.
sentences.cn: “我希望孩子能被善待。”赛赛曼先生果断地补充道。
